description: Erection of garage and extension to existing WC
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used for the extension to the toilet shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surrounding. | Any part of the new garage visible above the boundary wall on the north and eastern elevations of the garage shall be in brickwork to match the appearance of those used for the boundary wall.  REASON:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings. | The flat roof to be created shall not be used to form a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area.  REASON:	To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties.
